name: The Unknown Dude
description:
The Unknown Nude!

While exercising you lose HP a little bit faster...

While meditating you lose HP a little bit slower...

The merchant comes once every two days at the 7th hour of the day.

Press E to eat (if you have food)

According to old monks, you can meditate and do nothing else for more than a week straight and discover great insight and enlightenment...

Live!

Source code: https://github.com/alt-romes/ldjam45
